name: Station 228
description: Help the guard Ramses get out of this damn station. You need to go home to your family. Your awaits an incredible journey.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
